title: BOUND FOR GLORY
itunes:title: BOUND FOR GLORY
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
BOUND FOR GLORY! Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. This is a new motivational speech and our latest release with Billy Alsbrooks (https://bit.ly/BillyAlsbrooksMotiversity). The music is The Untold by Secession Studios (https://bit.ly/SecessionStudiosYouTube).

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
